languages.text: {n}Завершив очередной тяжелый день на посту Лорд-капитана, вы отправляетесь в свои покои для заслуженного отдыха. Однако через несколько часов ваш сон нарушен: из забытья вас вырывает далекий звук открывшейся двери, тяжелые неверные шаги и дуновение пронзительного холода из главной залы. Спешно собравшись, вы открываете дверь и переступаете порог...{/n}

{n}Another demanding day in the role of Lord Captain comes to a close, and you retreat to your chambers for rest. Hours later, however, your sleep is shattered by the faint creak of a door, the dragging weight of mis-stepped feet, and a piercing chill from the great hall. You quickly get dressed, open your door, and pass beyond the threshold…{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Завершив очередной тяжелый день на посту Лорд-капитана, вы отправляетесь в свои покои для заслуженного отдыха. Однако через несколько часов ваш сон нарушен: из забытья вас вырывает далекий звук открывшейся двери, тяжелые неверные шаги и дуновение пронзительного холода из главной залы. Спешно собравшись, вы открываете дверь и переступаете порог...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Another demanding day in the role of Lord Captain comes to its close, and you retreat to your chambers for rest. Hours later, however, your sleep is shattered: the faint creak of a door, the dragging weight of mis-stepped feet, and a piercing chill from the great hall. You hurry to dress, open your door, and pass beyond the threshold…{/n}

You quickly get dressed, open your door, and pass beyond the threshold…{/n}

languages.text: {n}ロードキャプテンとしての厳しい一日がまた終わり、部屋に戻って休んだ。数時間後、微かな扉のきしみと不規則に引きずる足音、そして大広間から刺すような冷気で、眠りが破られた。急いで服を着て扉を開け、敷居をまたぐ…{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Another demanding day in the role of Lord Captain comes to a close, and you retreat to your chambers for rest. Hours later, however, your sleep is shattered by the faint creak of a door, the dragging weight of mis-stepped feet, and a piercing chill from the great hall. You quickly get dressed, open your door, and pass beyond the threshold…{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ロードキャプテンとしての厳しい一日がまた終わり、部屋に戻って休んだ。数時間後、微かな扉のきしみと不規則に引きずる足音、そして大広間から刺すような冷気で、眠りが破られた。急いで服を着て扉を開け、敷居をまたぐ…{/n}

languages.text: {n}Otro día agotador en calidad de Lord Capitán toca a su fin, y te retiras a tus aposentos para descansar. Sin embargo, al cabo de unas horas tu sueño se ve interrumpido por el tenue chirrido de una puerta, unos pasos vacilantes y un frío penetrante que se filtra desde el gran salón. Te vistes rápidamente, abres la puerta de tu cámara y atraviesas el umbral...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Another demanding day in the role of Lord Captain comes to a close, and you retreat to your chambers for rest. Hours later, however, your sleep is shattered by the faint creak of a door, the dragging weight of mis-stepped feet, and a piercing chill from the great hall. You quickly get dressed, open your door, and pass beyond the threshold…{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Otro día agotador en calidad de Lord Capitán toca a su fin, y te retiras a tus aposentos para descansar. Sin embargo, al cabo de unas horas tu sueño se ve interrumpido por el tenue chirrido de una puerta, unos pasos vacilantes y un frío penetrante que se filtra desde el gran salón. Te vistes rápidamente, abres la puerta de tu cámara y atraviesas el umbral...{/n}

languages.text: {n}领主舰长繁忙的一天又结束了，你回到自己的房间休息。然而，几个小时之后，你的睡意被微弱的敲门声打破。你听到了踉踉跄跄的沉重脚步声，感觉到了房间里刺骨的寒意。你连忙穿好衣服，打开房门，迈出了门槛……{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Another demanding day in the role of Lord Captain comes to a close, and you retreat to your chambers for rest. Hours later, however, your sleep is shattered by the faint creak of a door, the dragging weight of mis-stepped feet, and a piercing chill from the great hall. You quickly get dressed, open your door, and pass beyond the threshold…{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}领主舰长繁忙的一天又结束了，你回到自己的房间休息。然而，几个小时之后，你的睡意被微弱的敲门声打破。你听到了踉踉跄跄的沉重脚步声，感觉到了房间里刺骨的寒意。你连忙穿好衣服，打开房门，迈出了门槛……{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ein weiterer schwieriger Tag in der Rolle des Lord Captains geht zu Ende, und du ziehst dich in deine Gemächer zurück, um dich auszuruhen. Einige Stunden später wird dein Schlaf allerdings vom leisen Knarzen einer Tür, vorsichtigen Schritten und einer eisigen Kälte aus der großen Halle gestört. Du ziehst dich rasch an, öffnest deine Tür und trittst über die Schwelle.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Another demanding day in the role of Lord Captain comes to a close, and you retreat to your chambers for rest. Hours later, however, your sleep is shattered by the faint creak of a door, the dragging weight of mis-stepped feet, and a piercing chill from the great hall. You quickly get dressed, open your door, and pass beyond the threshold…{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein weiterer schwieriger Tag in der Rolle des Lord Captains geht zu Ende, und du ziehst dich in deine Gemächer zurück, um dich auszuruhen. Einige Stunden später wird dein Schlaf allerdings vom leisen Knarzen einer Tür, vorsichtigen Schritten und einer eisigen Kälte aus der großen Halle gestört. Du ziehst dich rasch an, öffnest deine Tür und trittst über die Schwelle.{/n}

languages.text: {n}C'est une nouvelle journée épuisante qui s'achève en votre qualité de {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, et vous vous retirez dans vos quartiers pour vous reposer. Quelques heures plus tard, cependant, vous êtes {mf|tiré|tirée} de votre sommeil par le grincement discret d'une porte, des pas qui se traînent en désordre et un cri perçant dans la grande salle. Vous vous habillez à la hâte, vous ouvrez votre porte et vous avancez…{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Another demanding day in the role of Lord Captain comes to a close, and you retreat to your chambers for rest. Hours later, however, your sleep is shattered by the faint creak of a door, the dragging weight of mis-stepped feet, and a piercing chill from the great hall. You quickly get dressed, open your door, and pass beyond the threshold…{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}C'est une nouvelle journée épuisante qui s'achève en votre qualité de {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, et vous vous retirez dans vos quartiers pour vous reposer. Quelques heures plus tard, cependant, vous êtes {mf|tiré|tirée} de votre sommeil par le grincement discret d'une porte, des pas qui se traînent en désordre et un cri perçant dans la grande salle. Vous vous habillez à la hâte, vous ouvrez votre porte et vous avancez…{/n}

languages.text: {n}Lord Kaptanlık rolünde geçirilen zorlu bir gün daha sona eriyor ve dinlenmek üzere odana çekiliyorsun. Ancak saatler sonra uykun; kapının hafifçe gıcırdaması, yanlış atılmış adımların sürüklenen ağırlığı ve büyük salondan gelen delici bir soğuklukla bölünüyor. Hızla giyiniyor, kapını açıyor ve eşiği geçiyorsun...{/n}

You quickly get dressed, open your door, and pass beyond the threshold…{/n}
